summary: JUST AFTER THE 36,000 MILE WARRANTY WAS UP, THE ABS LIGHT ILLUMINATED AND THE PUMP  MOTOR RUNS CONTINUOUSLY.  HAD TO REMOVE THE FUSE TO STOP IT.  COST TO REPLACE IS $900 PLUS, ON A PART THAT SHOULD LAST THE LIFE OF THE TRUCK!  FRIENDS PURCHASED AN IDENTICAL TRUCK TO OUR, DID THE SAME THING AT 38,000 MILES.   *NLM
